---
title: "Merged DETECT FU Data Codebook"
---

```{r}
# Load needed packages
library(codebookr)
library(dplyr, warn.conflicts = FALSE)
library(readr)
```

# Purpose of the program

Using the CodebookR package, we will create a data dictionary for follow-up interview data for the DETECT project. 

# Load cleaned data
```{r}
#| warning: false
detect_fu_merge <- read_rds("../data/cleaned_rds_files/detect_fu_data_merged.rds")

```

# Set column attributes

```{r}
# Set the source for Participant data variables
participant_vars <- detect_fu_merge %>% 
  select(c(ends_with("_par"), medstar_id)) %>%
  names()

for(i in participant_vars) {
  attr(detect_fu_merge[[i]], "source") <- "DETECT Follow-up Interview Participant data"
}
```

# Select variables that will not have summary statistics
```{r}
no_stats <- detect_fu_merge %>%
  select(
    c(unique_id_par, medstar_internal_id_par, city_par, state_par, zip_code_par, phone_par, dob_par, incident_timestamp_par,
      unit_arrived_timestamp_par, ems_response_number_par, complaint_reported_par, incident_result_par, ems_crew_member_par,
      symptom_list_par, apt_par, address_par, xc_name_title_par, address_valid_par, address_updated_par, apt_updated_par,
      city_updated_par, zip_code_updated_par, (matches("^(x|xc)_") & !matches("_[0-9]+cat") & !xc_detect_positive_summary_count_par),
      matches("^(name)"), medstar_id, matches("comments"), matches("_why"), aps_reported_confirmation_number_obs, matches("_response"))
    )

no_stats_vars <- colnames(no_stats)

```

## APS Investigations
```{r}
detect_fu_merge <- detect_fu_merge %>%
cb_add_col_attributes( 
  x_created_by_aps, 
  description = "Person who created the record"
) %>%

cb_add_col_attributes( 
  x_created_timestamp_aps, 
  description = "Timestamp when the record was created",
  col_type = "Time"
) %>%

cb_add_col_attributes( 
  x_modified_by_aps, 
  description = "Person who modified the record"
) %>%

cb_add_col_attributes( 
  x_modified_timestamp_aps, 
  description = "Timestamp when the record was modified",
  col_type = "Time"
) %>%

cb_add_col_attributes( 
  x_error_message_aps, 
  description = "Error message entered by research team"
) %>%

cb_add_col_attributes( 
  x_record_month_aps, 
  description = "Month record was created",
  col_type = "Time"
) %>%

cb_add_col_attributes( 
  x_record_year_aps, 
  description = "Year record was created",
  col_type = "Time"
) %>%

cb_add_col_attributes( 
  x_record_status_aps, 
  description = "Status of the record as determined by research team"
) %>%

cb_add_col_attributes( 
  x_record_comment_aps, 
  description = "Comments by interviewer"
) %>%

cb_add_col_attributes( 
  xc_lead_panel_summary_count_aps, 
  description = "Calculated count of positive abuse instances across SelfReport, ApsInvestigations, and ObservationalMeasures"
) %>%

cb_add_col_attributes( 
  aps_report_4cat_aps, 
  description  = "AI_1. Has anyone from Adult Protective Services ever attempted to investigate whether or not you were living with elder abuse or neglect?",
  skip_pattern = "Skip to section 6 if any answer is given but Yes",
  value_labels = c(
    "Yes"        = 1, 
    "No"         = 2, 
    "Don’t know" = 7, 
    "Refused"    = 9
  ),
  col_type = "Categorical"
) %>%

cb_add_col_attributes( 
  aps_report_4cat_f_aps, 
  description = "AI_1. Has anyone from Adult Protective Services ever attempted to investigate whether or not you were living with elder abuse or neglect?",
        skip_pattern = "Skip to section 6 if any answer is given but Yes"
) %>%

cb_add_col_attributes(
  aps_times_5cat_aps, 
  description  = "AI_2. How many times has this happened in your life?",
  skip_pattern = "If answer is 0 or Refused, go to Section 6. If answer is 1 go to AI_4.",
  value_labels = c(
    "0"          = 0, 
    "1"          = 1, 
    "2+"         = 2, 
    "Don’t know" = 7, 
    "Refused"    = 9),
  col_type = "Categorical"
) %>%

cb_add_col_attributes( 
  aps_times_5cat_f_aps, 
  description = "AI_2. How many times has this happened in your life?",
  skip_pattern = "If answer is 0 or Refused, go to Section 6. If answer is 1 go to AI_4."
) %>%

cb_add_col_attributes( 
  aps_first_8cat_aps, 
  description = "When was the first time APS attempted to do an investigation?",
  skip_pattern = "If answer is Refused, go to Section 6. If answer is 1 to 7, go to AI_4.",
  value_labels = c(
    "10 or more years ago"                       = 1, 
    "5-10 years ago"                             = 2, 
    "1-5 years ago"                              = 3, 
    "In the past year but more than a month ago" = 4, 
    "In the past month"                          = 5, 
    "In the past week"                           = 6, 
    "Don’t know"                                 = 7,
    "Refused"                                    = 9
  ),
  col_type = "Categorical"
) %>%

cb_add_col_attributes( 
  aps_first_8cat_f_aps, 
  description = "When was the first time APS attempted to do an investigation?",
  skip_pattern = "If answer is Refused, go to Section 6. If answer is 1 to 7, go to AI_4."
) %>%

cb_add_col_attributes( 
  aps_recent_8cat_aps, 
  description = "AI_4. When was the most recent time APS attempted to do an investigation?",
  value_labels = c(
    "In the past week"                           = 1, 
    "In the past month"                          = 2,
    "In the past year but more than a month ago" = 3,
    "1-5 years ago"                              = 4,
    "5-10 years ago"                             = 5, 
    "10 or more years ago"                       = 6,
    "Don’t know"                                 = 7,
    "Refused"                                    = 9
  ),
  col_type = "Categorical"
) %>%

cb_add_col_attributes( 
  aps_recent_8cat_f_aps, 
  description = "AI_4. When was the most recent time APS attempted to do an investigation?"
)
```
